tgt_text: Tulina ffena okwegatta mu kulwanyisa obulwadde obutasiiga kuva ku muntu omu okudda ku mulala.

src_text: Non-communicable diseases exist among people in the community.
tgt_text: Endwadde ezitasiiga kuva ku muntu omu okudda ku mulala gyeziri mu bantu mu bitundu.

src_text: A laboratory is a place where experiments are made.
tgt_text: Ekkeberero kifo okugezesebwa gye kukolebwa.

src_text: Water is of great importance in our day to day life.
tgt_text: Amazzi ga mugaso nnyo mu bulamu bwaffe obwa bulijjo.

src_text: Media is one of the channels for creating awareness to the public.
tgt_text: Empuliziganya gumu ku mikutu gw'okubunyisa amawulire mu bantu.

src_text: Medical treatments lower the risk of the disease spread.
tgt_text: Obujjanjabi bukendeeza akatyabaga k'okusaasaanya obulwadde.

src_text: Personal hygiene is one of the ways to avoid the spread of diseases.
tgt_text: Obuyonjo y'emu ku ngeri ey'okutangira okusaasaana kw'endwadde.

src_text: Technological advancement has been of great benefit to in the medical sector.
tgt_text: Obuyiiya mu bya tekonologiya bubadde bwa mugaso nnyo mu kisaawe ky'ebyobulamu.

src_text: Viral diseases are a risk to the community.
tgt_text: Obulwadde obusaasaanyizibwa obuwuka bwa bulabe eri abantu.

src_text: Sports activities are best done in sportswear.
tgt_text: Ebyemizannyo bisinga kukolebwa mu ngoye z'ebyemizannyo.

src_text: Kids love to play games.
tgt_text: Abaana baagala okuzannya emizannyo.

src_text: Does aerobics really help one to keep fit?
tgt_text: Ddala kituufu dduyiro ayamba omuntu okukuuma omubiri?

src_text: Everyone is responsible for their healthy wellbeing.
tgt_text: Buli omu avunaanyizibwa ku bulamu bwe okubeera obulungi.

src_text: The public has a right to participate in national activities.
tgt_text: Abantu balina eddembe okwetaba mu mirimu gy'eggwanga.

src_text: Every nation has at least a day to celebrate.
tgt_text: Buli ggwanga lirinayo wakiri olunaku olw'okujjaguza.

src_text: Companies are fond of corporate social responsibility.
tgt_text: Kkamupi zitera okutuukiriza ouvunaanyizibwa obw'awamu.

src_text: Patients need confirmation from doctors on what kind of disease they are suffering from.
tgt_text: Abalwadde beetaaga okumanyisibwa okuva eri abasawo ku kika ky'obulwadde obubaluma.

src_text: Hospitals are very important facilities in the community.
tgt_text: Amalwaliro bifo bya mugaso nnyo mu kitundu.

src_text: Unhygienic behaviours can often result in disease spread.
tgt_text: Eneeyisa etali ya buyonjo esobola okuvaamu obulwadde okusaasaana.

src_text: Not all rumours are true.
tgt_text: Engambo zonna si ntuufu.

src_text: Contact with a recovered Ebola patient puts you at risk of contracting the disease.
tgt_text: Okusemberera omuntu awonye Ebola kikuteeka mu katyabaga k'okufuna ekirwadde.

src_text: Ebola is a viral disease that can easily spread.
tgt_text: Ebola bulwadde obutambuzibwa akawuka obusobola okusaasaanyizibwa amangu.

src_text: Prevention is usually better than cure.
tgt_text: Okutangira bulijjo kusinga okuwonya.

src_text: Every disease has its own signs and symptoms.
tgt_text: Buli bulwadde bulina obubonero bwabwo.

src_text: National leaders are responsible for the healthy wellbeing of fellow nationals.
tgt_text: Abakulembeze b'amawanga bavunaanyizibwa ku byobulamu ebirungi bya bannansi bannaabwe.

src_text: Educate communities about the existing diseases.
tgt_text: Somesa abantu ku ndwadde eziriwo.

src_text: Cholera can spread very fast in the community.
tgt_text: Kkolera asobola okusaasaana mangu nnyo mu kitundu

src_text: It is wise to protect yourself against disease while it's still early.
tgt_text: Kya magezi okwetangira obulwadde nga bukyali.

src_text: Many Ugandans would be so disciplined if coronavirus was like Ebola.
tgt_text: Bannayuganda bangi bandibadde n'empisa singa akawuka ka kolona kaali nga Ebola.

src_text: Uganda is always on high alert when it comes to diseases like Ebola.
tgt_text: Uganda eri ku bwerinde obwa waggulu bwe kituuka ku ndwadde nga Ebola.

src_text: There will be a mass vaccination campaign in Uganda.
tgt_text: Wajja kubaawo enteekateeka y'okugema okw'ekikungo mu Uganda.

src_text: Male partners can attend antenatal care as a way to support pregnant mothers.
tgt_text: Abaami basobola okubeera mu bifo ab'embuto we banywera eddagala ng'engeri y'okuyambako bamaama ab'embuto.

src_text: There is no political or religious affiliation when it comes to health.
tgt_text: Bwe kituuka ku byobulamu tetufa ku byabufuzi oba ku nzikiriza.

src_text: Buganda kingdom is being praised for its participation in raising awareness against sickle cells
tgt_text: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda bwebazibwa olw'okwenyigra mu kusaasaanya amawulire g'okulwanyisa nnalubiri.

src_text: Parliament officials have been denied access to the International Specialized Hospital.
tgt_text: Abakungu ba paalamenti bagaaniddwa okuyingira mu ddwaliro lya International specialized Hospital.

src_text: We need to create a conducive environment for feeding mothers at parliament.
tgt_text: Twetaaga okuteekawo ekifo ekirungi ekya bamaama abayonsa ku paalamenti

src_text: Staff recruitment was strictly by merit and given to those who passed interviews.
tgt_text: Okuyingiza abakozi kw'akoleddwa okusinziira ku busobozi era gyaweereddwa abo abaayise okugezesebwa.

src_text: Wishing all Muslims a happy Eid
tgt_text: Twagaliza abasiraamu bonna Eid ey'essanyu

src_text: Medical interns are being admitted to the internship training program
tgt_text: Abayizi abali mu kugezesebwa mu busawo bawandiisibwa ku nteekateeka z'okugezesebwa

src_text: Women and young adults are advised to take on family planning methods.
tgt_text: Abakyala n'abaana abakula bakubiriziddwa okukozesa enkola za kizaalaggumba.

src_text: A memorandum has been signed to promote cooperation in Health.
tgt_text: Enzikiriziganya eteekeddwako omukono okutumbula enkolagana mu byobulamu.

src_text: There will be training on how to do health sensitization using social media.
tgt_text: Wajja kubaawo okutendekebwa ku ngeri y'okubunyisaamu amawulire ku byobulamu ku mikutu emigattabantu.

src_text: Ugandan men play an important role in reproductive decisions.
tgt_text: Abasajja abannayuganda bakola omulimu munene mu kusalawo mu byokuzaala.

src_text: An Executive director has been congratulated upon securing the leadership role.
tgt_text: Nankulu ayozaayozeddwa olw'okufuna ekifo ky'obukulembeze.

src_text: Menstrual hygiene is essential for girls to be able to participate in schools.
tgt_text: Obuyonjo mu bakyala nga bali mu nsonga kikulu nnyo eri abawala okusobola okubeera mu masomero.

src_text: There is another senior leadership retreat in the health sector.
tgt_text: Waliwo olusirika olulala olw'abakugu mu byobulamu.

src_text: There is need to expand the emergency unit because of the increasing number of patients.
tgt_text: Waliwo obwetaavu bw'okugaziya ebifo awatuukira abayi olw'omuwendo gw'abalwadde abeeyongera.

src_text: Upgrading the health centre will mitigate congestion in general hospitals
tgt_text: Okuddaabiriza amalwaliro g'ebitundu kijja kukendeeza omujjuzo mu malwaliro amanene

src_text: Challenges faced in the quality of service delivery to pregnant mothers is being investigated.
tgt_text: Okusoomoozebwa okusangibwa mu buweeereza bwa bamaama ab'embuto kunoonyerezebwako.

src_text: Abstracts are needed for the national Health promotion conference.
tgt_text: Ebinokole byetaagibwa olw'olukiiko olutumbula ebyobulamu mu ggwanga.

src_text: A plan for health security has been launched in Uganda.
tgt_text: Enteekateeka z'okukuuma ebyobulamu zitongozeddwa mu Uganda.

src_text: Uganda received a thermoscanner that will be positioned at the airport.
tgt_text: Uganda yafunye akuuma akakebera ebbugumu akajja okuteekebwa ku kisaawe ky'ennyonyi.

src_text: Kawempe hospital is being discussed on a radio program
tgt_text: Eddwaliro ly'e Kawempe likubaganyizibwako ebirowoozo ku pulogulaamu ya laadiyo.

src_text: Ugandans are urged to join the blood donation cause.
tgt_text: Bannayuganda bakubirizibwa okwegatta ku mulanga gw'okugaba omusaayi.

src_text: A donation plan has been launched with Rotarian malaria partners.
tgt_text: Enteekateeka y'obuyambi etongozeddwa ne bannamukago ba lotale abalwanyisa omusujja gw'ensiri.

src_text: A jigger treatment lotion will be made by the Saraya company.
tgt_text: Loosoni ejjanjaba envunza ejja kukolebwa kkampuni ya Saraya.

src_text: More specialists are being trained to reduce both referrals abroad and mortality rates.
tgt_text: Abakugu abalala batendekebwa okukendeeza ku kutwala abalwadde ebweru w'eggwanga n'abaana abafa nga bato.

src_text: Sanitary towels are being made out of sugarcane residues in Uganda.
tgt_text: Ppamba w'ekikyala akolebwa mu bisigalira by'ebikajjo wano mu Uganda.

src_text: Discussions are ongoing on how to implement solutions against disease outbreaks.
tgt_text: Enteesaganya zigenda mu maaso ku ngeri y'okwewalamu ebirwadde ebibalukawo.

src_text: lessons learnt are being revised to improve Ebola preparedness.
tgt_text: Essomo eriyigiddwa lyetegerezebwa okulongoosa  ku kwetegekera Ebola.

src_text: Uganda has an Ebola case confirmed in Kasese district
tgt_text: Uganda erina omulwadde wa Ebola eyakakasibwa okuva mu disitulikiti y'e Kasese.

src_text: Vomiting and bleeding from openings are some of the signs of Ebola.
tgt_text: Okusesema n'okuvaamu omusaayi okuva mu buli katuli k'omubiri bumu ku bubonero bwa Ebola.

src_text: The new board of directors for Soroti referral hospital have been inaugurated.
tgt_text: Olukiiko olw'oku ntikko oluggya olw'eddwaliro ekkulu e Soroti lulayiziddwa.

src_text: A female from Congo that was confirmed to have Ebola virus has passed on.
tgt_text: Omukyala okuva e Congo eyakakasibwa okuba n'obulwadde bwa Ebola afudde.

src_text: A professor has been congratulated on winning the health award
tgt_text: Pulofeesa ayozaayozeddwa olw'okuwangula omudaali gw'ebyobulamu.

src_text: Health workers have been named heroes for subjecting individuals to handwashing and screening.
tgt_text: Abasawo batuumiddwa abazira olw'okukubiriza abantu okunaaba mu ngalo n'okwekebeza.

src_text: Poor communication between men and women could lead to failed family planning methods.
tgt_text: Empuliziganya embi wakati w'abaami n'abakyala eyinza okuleeta okulemesa enkola za kizaalaggumba.

src_text: A booster dose of oral Polio vaccine will be given to all children under five.
tgt_text: Ddoozi ya ppooliyo ey'omu kamwa eyongera amaanyi ejja kuweebwa abaana bonna abali wansi w'emyaka etaano.

src_text: Interventions have been put in place to address the outbreak of cholera.
tgt_text: Kaweefube ateekeddwawo okwengaanga okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde kya kkolera.

src_text: The Health Ministry continues to advocate for a malaria-free country.
tgt_text: Minisitule y'ebyobulamu ekyagenda mu maaso ne kaweefube w'okumalirawo ddala omusujja gw'ensiri mu ggwanga.

src_text: There is an improvement in the transportation of blood samples.
tgt_text: Waliwo okutereezebwa mu ntambuza ya sampolo z'omusaayi.

src_text: A company is being appreciated for its contribution towards improving maternity services for females.
tgt_text: Kkampuni yeebazibwa olw'okukola ennyo okutumbula embeera abakyala mwe bazaalira.

src_text: Submit your abstract for the national health Promotion conference.
tgt_text: Waayo ebirowoozo byo eby'olukiiko olubunyisa ebyobulamu mu ggwanga lyonna.

src_text: Abstinence should be practised to delay the first pregnancy
tgt_text: Obuteegatta kirina okuteekebwa mu nkola okulwisaawo okufuna olubuto olusooka.

src_text: The Household head has a role in disease prevention
tgt_text: Akulira amaka alina obuvunaanyizibwa mu kutangira ensaasaana y'obulwadde.

src_text: The country is preparing for a Measles-Rubella free community
tgt_text: Eggwanga liteekateeka okumalawo Olukusense-Kikutiya mu bantu

src_text: Activities to ensure a healthy population are being advised by the Ministry of Health
tgt_text: Ebintu by'okutumbula obulamu mu banti bikolebwako minisitule y'ebyobulamu.

src_text: Discussions on Ebola, human immunodeficiency virus and Malaria are underway.
tgt_text: Okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku Ebola, akawuka akaleeta mukenenya n'omusujja gw'ensiri biri mu nteekateeka.

src_text: There is a growth of Palliative care and access to controlled medicines in Uganda.
tgt_text: Waliwo okugenda mu maaso ku kulwanyisa ensaasaana y'obulwadde n'obwangu okufuna eddagala eryetaagisa mu Uganda.

src_text: People in the Northern region need free health services like family planning and HIV testing.
tgt_text: Abantu b'omu bukiikakkono beetaga okufuna ebyobulamu eby'obwereere nga enkola y'ekizaalaggumba n'okukeberebwa akawuka akaleeta mukeenenya.

src_text: The United Nations General Assembly continues to do its work in Uganda.
tgt_text: Olukiiko lw'omukago ogutaba ensi zonna lukyagenda mu maaso okukola omulimu gwalwo mu Uganda.

src_text: Play your part to fight Non-Communicable Diseases
tgt_text: Tuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa bwo okulwanyisa obulwadde obutasiigibwa okuva ku muntu omu okudda ku mulala

src_text: A roadmap to Universal Health Coverage has been developed
tgt_text: Olugendo olututuusa ku kwetegereza ebyobulamu eby'awamu lutongozeddwa

src_text: The nationwide health sensitization program will be launched
tgt_text: Okusomesa eggwanga lyonna ku byobulamu kujja kutongozebwa

src_text: A new maternity centre will be built in a district in Uganda
tgt_text: Ekifo ekizaalirwamu ekipya kijja kuzimbibwa mu disitulikiti emu mu Uganda

src_text: Government has decided to support farmers in the northern part of Uganda.
tgt_text: Gavumenti esazeewo okuyambako abalimi mu bitundu by'obukiikakkono bwa Uganda.

src_text: When is Uganda's independence?
tgt_text: Ameefuga ga Uganda ga ddi?

src_text: Refugees should be allowed to come into the country.
tgt_text: Abanoonyiboobubudamu balina okukkirizibwa okujja mu ggwanga.

src_text: People in Uganda are now forging national identity cards.
tgt_text: Abantu mu Uganda kati bajingirira endagamuntu.

src_text: A well-built septic tank shouldn't be a threat to anyone.
tgt_text: Ekinnya kya kazambi tekirina kweraliikiriza muntu yenna.

src_text: There is a rise in theft and killings in the rural parts of the country.
tgt_text: Obubbi n'okutta byeyongedde mu bitundu by'eggwanga eby'omu byalo.

src_text: The widow takes half of the deceased's property.
tgt_text: Nnamwandu atwala ekitundu ku bintu by'omugenzi.

src_text: A person can go to exile either by force or willingly.
tgt_text: Omuntu asobola okugenda mu buwanganguse ng'akakiddwa oba nga yeeyagalidde.

src_text: Creating jobs for Ugandans by building factories is good for Uganda.
tgt_text: Okutonderawo bannayuganda emirimu nga bazimba amakolero kirungi eri Uganda.

src_text: The government tries to intervene when media companies publish false news.
tgt_text: Gavumenti egezaako okuvaayo nga kkampuni z'amawulire zifulumya amawulire amafu.

src_text: Protecting human rights has many benefits.
tgt_text: Okukuuma eddembe ly'obuntu kirina emiganyulo mingi.

src_text: It is very hard to survive a highway car accident
tgt_text: Kibeera kizibu nnyo okuwona akabenje k'emmotoka ku luguudo lwa mwasanjala.

src_text: With this new machinery, road construction will become easier.
tgt_text: Okukola enguudo kujja kwanguwa olwa kino ekyuma ekipya.

src_text: Members of parliament are always requesting for money.
tgt_text: Ababaka ba paalamenti buli kaseera basaba ssente.

src_text: Members of Parliament can decide either to support or not to support the motion.
tgt_text: Ababaka ba paalamenti basobola okusalawo okuwagira oba obutawagira kiteeso.

src_text: The government wants to construct a big hospital where students can also study.
tgt_text: Gavumenti eyagala okuzimba ddwaliro ddene abayizi nabo gye bayinza okusomera.

src_text: In Uganda, nobody is above the law.
tgt_text: Mu Uganda tewali ali waggulu w'amateeka.

src_text: Having swimming pools at home is dangerous.
tgt_text: Okubeera n'ekidiba omuwugirwa ewaka kya bulabe.

src_text: The matter is still in court.
tgt_text: Ensongo ekyali mu kkooti.

src_text: The government is looking for other ways to get taxes.
tgt_text: Gavumenti enoonya ngeri ndala za kufunamu misolo.

src_text: Parents are advised to protect their children from strangers.
tgt_text: Abazadde baweebwa amagezi okukuuma abaana baabwe okuva eri abalabe.

src_text: The royal family is involved in some land wrangles.
tgt_text: Olulyo olulangira luli mu nkaayana za ttaka.

src_text: Ugandan laws are usually not put into action.
tgt_text: Amateeka ga Uganda tegatera kuteekebwa mu nkola.

src_text: It is good to read newspapers on a daily basis.
tgt_text: Kirungi okusoma empapula z'amawulire buli lunaku.

src_text: During the lockdown, it was hard for people to travel back to Uganda.
tgt_text: Mu biseera by'omuggalo kyali kizibu abantu okudda mu Uganda.

src_text: Nowadays married women like spending time with rich men instead of their husbands.
tgt_text: Ennaku zino abakyala abafumbo baagala okumala obudde n'abasajja abagagga okusinga ba bba baabwe.

src_text: Many girls are taken to Arab nations illegally.
tgt_text: Abawala bangi batwalibwa mu mawanga g'Abawalabu mu bumenyi bw'amateeka.

src_text: A soldier's life is different from a civilian's life.
tgt_text: Obulamu bw'omusirikale bwa njawulo ku bw'omuntu wa bulijjo.

src_text: Uganda's security has improved due to the installation of cameras.
tgt_text: Ebyokwerinda bya Uganda byeyongedde olw'okuteekawo kkamera.

src_text: There is illegal selling of body parts in government hospitals.
tgt_text: Waliwo okutunda ebitundu by'omubiri okutali mu mateeka mu malwaliro ga gavumenti.

src_text: In order to be safe, you should never stay on mountain slopes.
tgt_text: Okusobola okubeera obulungi, tolina kubeera kumpi na nsozi.

src_text: There is a relationship between Uganda and Israel.
tgt_text: Waliwo enkolagana wakati wa Uganda ne Israel.

src_text: Every year the government gives a huge sum of money to political parties.
tgt_text: Buli mwaka gavumenti ewa ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi ssente nnyingi nnyo.

src_text: Government has been in land wrangles for a long time.
tgt_text: Gavumenti ebadde mu nkaayana z'ettaka okumala ebbanga eriwerako.

src_text: I still have faith in Uganda's court system.
tgt_text: Nkyalina okukkiriza mu nkola ya kkooti za Uganda.

src_text: The youth were encouraged to work hard in order to earn a living.
tgt_text: Abavubuka baakubirizibwa okukola ennyo okusobola okufuna ssente.

src_text: You need to hand over power to another person.
tgt_text: Weetaaga okuwaayo obuyinza eri omuntu omulala.

src_text: The sanitation in Makerere university is lacking lately.
tgt_text: Obuyonjo mu ssetendekero wa Makerere bubulamu ennaku zino.

src_text: Most people buy newspapers after reading some interesting headlines.
tgt_text: Abantu bangi bagula empapula z'amawulire oluvannyuma lw'okusoma emitwe eginyuma.

src_text: The government should strengthen the police force in order to reduce crime.
tgt_text: Gavumenti yeetaaga okwongera amaanyi mu poliisi okusobola okukendeeza ku buzzi bw'emisango.

src_text: When you get old, you are expected to retire.
tgt_text: Bw'okaddiwa osuubirwa okuwummula.

src_text: if you are innocent, the police are obligated to release you.
tgt_text: Bw'oba toilna musango, poliisi kigikakatako okukuta.

src_text: A new political party has been formed in Uganda with new colours and symbols.
tgt_text: Ekibiina ky'ebyobufuzi ekiggya kigunjiddwawo mu Uganda ne langi empya n'obubonero.

src_text: We need to celebrate this day.
tgt_text: Twetaaga okujaguza olunaku luno.

src_text: Borders are going to be closed.
tgt_text: Ensalo zigenda kuggalwa.

src_text: Disagreements can always be solved.
tgt_text: Obutakkaanya bulijjo busobola okugonjoolwa .

src_text: Youths are now forming criminal gangs to torture civilians.
tgt_text: Abavubuka kati bagunjaawo bibinja mwe baddiza emisango okutulugunya abantu ba bulijjo.

src_text: People committing crimes are increasing each year.
tgt_text: Abantu abazza emisango beeyongera buli mwaka.

src_text: There are still loopholes in the registration of sim cards.
tgt_text: Wakyaliwo emiwaatwa mu kuwandiisa layini z'amasimu.

src_text: Let us wait for the judge's ruling.
tgt_text: Ka tulinde ensala y'omulamuzi.

src_text: People with HIV are reminded to pick their medicine on time.
tgt_text: Abantu abalina akawuka akaleeta mukenenya bajjukizibwa okukima eddagala lyabwe mu budde.

src_text: The role of the police is to keep law and order.
tgt_text: Omulimu gwa poliisi gwa kukuuma mateeka n'ebiragiro.

src_text: Many people have been hurt by the police while it enforces law and order.
tgt_text: Abantu bangi balumiziddwa nga poliisi eteekesa mu nkola amateeka n'ebiragiro.

src_text: By attending bride and groom events you get exposed to new things.
tgt_text: Okugenda ku mukolo gw'embaga omanya ebintu ebipya bingi.

src_text: Newspapers can be bought anywhere and their prices are low.
tgt_text: Empapula z'amawulire zisobola okugulibwa awantu wonna era n'ebbeeyi yaago eri wansi.

src_text: Heavy rains destroyed people's property.
tgt_text: Enkuba ennyingi eyonoona ebintu by'abantu.

src_text: Good builders need good quality construction materials to build a good house.
tgt_text: Abazimbi abalungi beetaaga ebizimbisibwa eby'omutindo omulungi okuzimba ennyumba ennungi.

src_text: Various people have different opinions concerning relationships.
tgt_text: Abantu ab'enjawulo balina endowooza ez'enjawulo bwe kituuka ku by'omukwano.

src_text: When is the next football match?
tgt_text: Omupiira oguddako gwa ddi?

src_text: There is more stability in Uganda than in other countries.
tgt_text: Mu Uganda mulimu obutebenkevu bungi okusinga mu mawanga amalala.

src_text: the Uganda Martyrs that were killed were not only from the Buganda region
tgt_text: Abajulizi ba Uganda abattibwa baali tebava mu kitundu kya Buganda kyokka.

src_text: Uganda is the least developed country in East Africa.
tgt_text: Uganda y'ensi esinga okuba emabega mu by'enkulaakulana mu East Africa.

src_text: Because of poverty, parents are no longer providing the best for their children.
tgt_text: Olw'obwavu, abazadde tebakyayinza kuwa baana baabwe ekyo ekisingayo.

src_text: Landlords in Kampala are to start paying taxes for their houses.
tgt_text: Bannannyini mayumba baakutandika okusasulira amayumba gaabwe emisolo.

src_text: Doctors in private hospitals get better salaries than those in government hospitals.
tgt_text: Abasawo mu malwaliro ag'obwannannyini bafuna emisaala emirungi okusinga abo abali mu ga gavumenti.

src_text: Government has decided to increase the salaries of teachers.

src_text: Bodaboda riders should work closely with traffic authorities to reduce road accidents
tgt_text: Abavuzi ba booda booda balina okukolera awamu n'abaserikale b'oku nguuddo okukendeeza obubenje ku nguudo.

src_text: More road safety sensitization is a need in rural areas as it's done in urban communities
tgt_text: Okumanyisibwa mu nkozesa y'enduudo ennungi kwetaagibwa mu byalo nga bwe kikolebwa mu bitundu by'ekibuga

src_text: Private bodaboda owners should also adhere to the road safety guidelines
tgt_text: Bannannyini booda booda ez'obwannanyini balina okugoberera amateeka agafuga enkozesa y'enguudo.

src_text: Road safety drives can also include community cleaning activities and sanitation awareness
tgt_text: Enkozesa y'enguudo ennungi esobola okuzingiramu emirimu gy'okuyonja n'okubunyisa amawulire ku buyonjo.

src_text: We should buy locally made products to help build our local economy
tgt_text: Tulina okugula ebintu ebikolebwa wano okuyamba okuzimba ebyenfuna by'eggwanga.

src_text: Construction of the state of the art stadiums will help boost sports activities
tgt_text: Okuzimba ebisaawe ggaggadde kijja kutumbula ebyemizannyo.

src_text: Children in refugee camps should get an education like normal citizens
tgt_text: Abaana mu nkambi z'abanoonyiboobubudamu balina okutuusibwako ebyenjigiriza nga bannansi

src_text: The government should award contracts to local manufacturers to create more local jobs
tgt_text: Gavumenti erina okuwa endagaano eri bannamakolero wano okusobola okutondawo emirimu mu nsi emirala

src_text: The good road network makes the delivery of support to refugees easier
tgt_text: Amakubo amalungi gasobozesa okutuusa obuyambi eri abanoonyiboobubudamu okwangu.

src_text: Many refugees suffer from malnutrition due to lack of a balanced diet
tgt_text: Abanoonyiboobubudamu bangi bakosebwa endya embi olw'ebbula ly'emmere erimu ebiriisa.

src_text: Self-diagnosis kits help in early disease detection in rural communities
tgt_text: Ebikozesebwa mu kwekebera enddwadde biyamba mu kukenga amangu enddwadde mu byalo.

src_text: The war in South Sudan has led to a refugee influx in Uganda
tgt_text: Olutalo mu South Sudani luleetedde abanyoonyiboobubudamu abangi okuyingira mu Uganda.

src_text: International Organizations often come out to donate food to refugees
tgt_text: Ebitongole by'ensi yonna bitera okuvaayo ne biwa emmere abanoonyiboobubudamu.

src_text: The government should follow up on education for children refugees
tgt_text: Gavumenti erina okulondoola ensoma y'abaana abanoonyiboobubudamu.

src_text: Refugee children should be trained in carpentry and welding to earn a living
tgt_text: Abaana abanoonyiboobubudamu bayina okuteendekebwa mu kubajja n'okwokya ebyuma okusobola okufuna ssente.

src_text: Schools should adopt online learning during this pandemic
tgt_text: Amasomero gayina okwettanira okusomeseza ku mitimbagano mu biseera by'ekirwadde bbunansi kino.

src_text: Refugee children also deserve an education so they can take care of their families
tgt_text: Abaana abanoonyiboobubudamu nabo basaana okusomesebwa basobole okulabirira amaka gaabwe.

src_text: The government should allocate more money to refugee budgets
tgt_text: Gavumenti erina okwongera ku ssente z'eteeka ku mbaririra y'abanoonyiboobubudamu.

src_text: Vocational skills are an important form of education for refugees

src_text: Money allocated for disaster relief should not be swindled as this affects the country
tgt_text: Ensimbi eziteekebwa ku bibamba tezirina kubbibwa kubanga kino kikosa eggwanga.

src_text: Quality assurance inspections ensure students are getting the best education services

src_text: Teacher accommodation facilitation ensures teachers never run late for classes

src_text: We all need to welcome refugees in our country.

src_text: Refugee agricultural projects ensure that these communities can now feed themselves
tgt_text: Polojekiti z'abanoonyiboobubudamu ez'ebyobulimi zigenderera okulaba nga ebitundu bino kati bisobola okwerabirira.

src_text: Refugee communities should engage with host communities to build social relationships
tgt_text: Abanoonyiboobubudamu bayina okukwatagaana n'ababasenzezza okusobola okuzimba ekolagana.

src_text: The health sector is staff deficient creating a large doctor to patient ratio

src_text: Doctors need free accommodation as an incentive

src_text: Surgeons are very rare in hospitals hence creating a huge demand

src_text: Regular inspection of newly constructed roads is needed for quality assurance

src_text: The government should reduce borrowing and use local revenue
tgt_text: Gavumenti eyina okukeendeeza ku kwewola ekozese ku ssente z'ejja mu misolo gya kuno.

src_text: The general public has distrust in law enforcement institutes

src_text: Poaching harms the tourism industry as species keep reducing

src_text: Mob violence should strongly be condemned as an innocent life may be lost

src_text: Business people are often assassinated due to business wrangles

src_text: Being a Ugandan businessman attracts enemies

src_text: Hotels should step up their security to protect their guests

src_text: Assassins in Uganda obtain guns illegally and use Bodabodas

src_text: Mob violence has resulted in the deaths of innocent people

src_text: The law states that someone is innocent until proven guilty

src_text: Gangs often obtain guns illegally from security guards

src_text: Some guns obtained illegally come from cattle rustlers in Karamoja region

src_text: Community policing is important in reducing crime

src_text: People shouldn't engage in mob violence but call the police to take charge

src_text: Always move with your National Identity card for easy identification

src_text: Police investigations usually take long hence leaving us with no answers

src_text: Land wrangles have often resulted in deaths and evictions

src_text: Tribalism can often lead to war if it is not brought under control

src_text: Authorities should solve land wrangles to prevent violence

src_text: A land title helps one prove that they own the land they have

src_text: Clear boundaries should be demarcated to prevent land encroachment

src_text: Cultural leaders should sensitize their communities to take part in commercial Agriculture

src_text: People need to be sensitized on land rights to avoid land violence
tgt_text: Abantu bayina okumanyisibwa ku mateeka g'ettaka okutangira obutabanguko ku ttaka.

src_text: Cultural leaders should preach peace and harmony in their communities
tgt_text: Abakulembeze b'ennono balina okukubiriza emirembe n'obumu mu bitundu byabwe.

src_text: Land wrangles result in division among family members

src_text: Cultural leaders shouldn't promote division in their communities

src_text: The Ugandan judiciary has been accused of massive corruption

src_text: Cultural leaders need to come to a consensus to prevent tribal wars

src_text: There is mismanagement of funds in district financial committees

src_text: Many local council officials have been sighted as being involved in corruption scandals

src_text: The government should tighten its grip on corruption in districts

src_text: Regular audits should be done at the district level to curb corruption

src_text: Local council members found guilty of corruption should serve jail time

src_text: Sports funds are often mismanaged hence affecting the sector

src_text: There are allegations of fraud in the district procurement department

src_text: Top district officials need to provide financial accountability to their communities

src_text: District funds can be diverted to economic projects aimed at poverty eradication

src_text: Assets of corrupt officials should be frozen when proven guilty

src_text: Some government officials are falsely accused of corruption hence tarnishing their image

src_text: Lack of evidence is common in corruption cases since corrupt officials cover their tracks

src_text: Most corruption cases get thrown out of court due to lack of evidence

src_text: Organizations should use financial technologies in the fight against corruption

src_text: Witch-hunting is common in public office which can result in false allegations

src_text: National Forestry Authority is often accused of mismanagement of forests
